com.nhn.android.maps

Interface NMapLocationManager.OnLocationChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NMapMyLocationOverlay
    Enclosing class:
    NMapLocationManager

    public static interface NMapLocationManager.OnLocationChangeListener
    Interface for listeners interested in the state change of location.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onLocationChanged(NMapLocationManager locationManager, NGeoPoint myLocation)
      Called when the location value has changed.
      void onLocationUnavailableArea(NMapLocationManager locationManager, NGeoPoint myLocation)
      Called when the location value has changed but it is unavailable area to display in NMapView.
      void onLocationUpdateTimeout(NMapLocationManager locationManager)
      Called when the location update timeout.

    • Method Detail

      • onLocationChanged

        boolean onLocationChanged(NMapLocationManager locationManager,
                          NGeoPoint myLocation)
        Called when the location value has changed.
        Parameters:
        locationManager - - The location manger that has changed.
        myLocation - - a new location.
        Returns:
        true to keep this listener, false to unregister it.

      • onLocationUpdateTimeout

        void onLocationUpdateTimeout(NMapLocationManager locationManager)
        Called when the location update timeout.
        Parameters:
        locationManager - - The location manger that has changed.

      • onLocationUnavailableArea

        void onLocationUnavailableArea(NMapLocationManager locationManager,
                               NGeoPoint myLocation)
        Called when the location value has changed but it is unavailable area to display in NMapView.
        Parameters:
        locationManager - - The location manger that has changed.
        myLocation - - a new location.
